text: Clothes wash (when basket is more than half full)
Broom all rooms + kitchen + store + bathrooms
Mop all rooms + kitchen + store + bathrooms
Before leaving – final check (curtains open terrace doors closed lights on chairs set gates locked)
Special brooming and mopping – Gym room areas
Siddharth's room – broom + mop + bed arrange + dusting
Bedsheet pillow cover cushion cover change
Ceiling cobweb removal and fan wiping
